show.subtitle: Specific information about using evidenced based natural health choices, with knowledgeable authors, guests and hosts.
show.title: The Natural Nurse

title: The Natural Nurse
content:
Host Dr. Eugene Zampieron, ND, MH, www.drznaturally.com, interviews Michael T. Murray ND. Dr. Murray  is a naturopathic physician regarded as one of the world’s top authorities on natural medicine.
An educator, lecturer, researcher, and health food industry consultant, he is the author of more than 30 books, including his newest with coauthor Joseph Pizzorno ND, The Encyclopedia of Natural Medicine (Atria, Third Edition, 2012).
Contact: http://www.drmurray.com/
